# isoformic

Welcome to `isoformic`, a workflow for isoform-level biological
interpretation of transcriptomic data.

This workflow uses known annotated transcripts to produce biologically
relevant results based on the different types of transcripts for any
comparison of case versus control transcriptomic data.

## Installation

``` r
install.packages("isoformic", repos = c("https://luciorq.r-universe.dev", getOption("repos")))
```

You can install the development version of `isoformic` from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
if (requireNamespace("remotes", quietly = TRUE)) {
  install.packages("remotes")
}
remotes::install_github("luciorq/isoformic")
```

## Overview

![Types of Transcripts](https://i.imgur.com/UWoAr0k.png)

Types of Transcripts

## Motivation

Performing differential expression analysis at the isoform level, rather
than at the gene level, is important for gaining a more detailed
understanding of gene regulation and functional differences in
biological systems.

While gene-level analysis provides insights into the overall expression
changes of genes, it fails to capture the complex dynamics occurring at
the isoform level. Isoforms, resulting from alternative splicing or
alternative transcription start sites, can possess distinct structural
features and functional properties.

By examining isoform-level expression changes, researchers can identify
and characterize specific isoforms that may have unique roles in
cellular processes, such as isoform-specific protein-protein
interactions or protein functions.

This granularity enables a more accurate interpretation of complex
biological phenomena, such as tissue-specific expression patterns, cell
differentiation, or disease progression.

Additionally, isoform-level analysis can help uncover regulatory
mechanisms and identify potential biomarkers or therapeutic targets that
may be missed when solely relying on gene-level analysis. Therefore,
considering the isoform-level expression changes provides a more
comprehensive view of transcriptional dynamics and enhances our
understanding of gene regulation in a given biological context.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

# Package index

## All functions

- [`IsoformicExperiment()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/IsoformicExperiment.md)
  [`col_data()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/IsoformicExperiment.md)
  [`annot_data_transcripts()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/IsoformicExperiment.md)
  [`annot_data_genes()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/IsoformicExperiment.md)
  [`annot_data_exons()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/IsoformicExperiment.md)
  [`annot_data()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/IsoformicExperiment.md)
  [`annot_row_names()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/IsoformicExperiment.md)
  [`col_names()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/IsoformicExperiment.md)
  [`row_names()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/IsoformicExperiment.md)
  [`tx_to_gene()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/IsoformicExperiment.md)
  [`row_data()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/IsoformicExperiment.md)
  [`tx_annot()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/IsoformicExperiment.md)
  [`de_tx()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/IsoformicExperiment.md)
  [`de_gene()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/IsoformicExperiment.md)
  : IsoformicExperiment Class
- [`as_isoformic()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/as_isoformic.md)
  : Convert a SummarizedExperiment to an IsoformicExperiment Object
- [`create_context_data()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/create_context_data.md)
  : Create ContextData Object
- [`download_reference()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/download_reference.md)
  : Download Reference Files from GENCODE
- [`get_isoformic_cache()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/get_isoformic_cache.md)
  : Retrieve System-Dependent Cache Path for Isoformic
- [`is_deg_sig()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/is_deg_sig.md)
  : Annotate Transcripts with Differential Gene Expression Significance
- [`join_DEG_DET()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/join_DEG_DET.md)
  : Merge Gene and Transcript Level Differential Expression Tables
- [`make_tx_to_gene()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/make_tx_to_gene.md)
  : Create Transcript-to-Gene Relationship Table
- [`plot_genomic_context()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/plot_genomic_context.md)
  : Plot Transcripts Genomic Context
- [`plot_log2FC()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/plot_log2FC.md)
  [`plot_log2fc()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/plot_log2FC.md)
  : Plot Log2 Fold-Change Results for Transcripts of Selected Genes
- [`plot_tx_context()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/plot_tx_context.md)
  : Plot Transcript Genomic Context
- [`plot_tx_expr()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/plot_tx_expr.md)
  : Plot Transcript per gene expression
- [`prepare_annotation()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/prepare_annotation.md)
  : Prepare Annotation
- [`prepare_annotation_db()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/prepare_annotation_db.md)
  : Write Parquet File from GFF
- [`prepare_exon_annotation()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/prepare_exon_annotation.md)
  : Prepare Exon based Position Annotation Table
- [`prepare_isoformic_annotation()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/prepare_isoformic_annotation.md)
  : Write Feature Annotation to Parquet Files
- [`prepare_profile_data()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/prepare_profile_data.md)
  : Prepare Data for Gene and Transcript Expression Profile Plot
- [`run_enrichment()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/run_enrichment.md)
  : Run Gene Set Enrichment Analysis for Different Transcript Types
- [`salmon_index()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/salmon_index.md)
  : Build Salmon Index
- [`salmon_quant()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/salmon_quant.md)
  : Run Salmon Quantification
- [`tx_type_palette()`](https://luciorq.github.io/isoformic/reference/tx_type_palette.md)
  : Transcript Type Color Palette
